title: Photodex ProShow Producer 4.52.3049 Portable [ak]
description:
Photodex ProShow Producer 4.52.3049 Portable

Blend your photography with music and videos to produce impressive multimedia slide shows. Great for promoting your business, proofing images for clients or wowing any audience. Using Producer's advanced features, like Masking and Keyframing, you can easily create impressive effects in your slide shows. Manage difficult deadlines. Productivity-boosters like show templates and settings-copying cut production time. Output to over 40 different formats, including DVD, Blu-ray, CD, EXE, Flash, HD Video, and more! You can even upload shows directly to YouTubeÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and output to 20 different devices including the iPodÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and BlackberryÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â®. Branding and protection features enable you to grow and protect your hard-earned business. Make a commercial for your website or portfolio-on-disc to hand out to prospects.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Drag and drop to easily add content to a show
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Supports 100+ file types
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Transparency support for PSD, PNG, TIFF and GIF files
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Turn any layer into a fully-customized mask to conceal or reveal aspects of underlying layers
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Add a gradient or solid color as a slide layer to a layer to get incredible results

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Crop and rotate your photos and videos with precision
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Use the red-eye removal tool to correct any photo in your show in seconds
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Use adjustment effects to produce spectacular effects. Make a video move through color shifts or create a sequence of photo fades

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The fully-customizable slide preview grid allows you to accurately position your photos and videos on a slide
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Control the font, size and color of captions in your slides

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Add interactive captions to launch actions like Pause, Resume, Next Slide, Previous Slide, Write Email and many more

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Slide Styles are pre-made effects that you can apply to any slide in your show
